185737286.review: El juego esta excelente, de hecho es muy bueno, mi problema fue cuando estaba tratando de obtener el logro de pasarme "Resurrection of Evil" en pesadilla, el problema llego cuando a mitad de la campaña se me bugeo el artefacto de tal manera que no podía recoger almas ni tampoco usarlo, en esta dificultad el uso del artefacto es indispensable para avanzar, a pesar de haber tenido múltiples puntos de guardado no pude retroceder lo suficiente como para que el bug desapareciera lo que tiro a la basura todo mi progreso del día.

185710139.review: Doom 3 BFG Edition ist die "optimierte" Version die einige Jahre nach dem Original Doom 3 erschien. Es wurden auch noch einige DLC's und die Original Doom Versionen in das Spiel integriert. Die Grafik ist von gewohnt guter Qualität, der Sound überzeugt und die Handlung ist spannend und abwechslungsreich inszeniert. Eine gute Version von Doom 3 die im Sale zum kleinen Preis zu kaufen ist.

185694289.review:
DOOM 3: BFG Edition brings the iconic 2004 shooter into the modern era with a remastered version that includes both the base game and its expansions, along with improved graphics and smoother gameplay. While DOOM 3 was a departure from the classic DOOM formula, focusing more on atmosphere, horror, and slower-paced, methodical combat, it still delivers a chilling experience full of demonic encounters and intense action.

The BFG Edition’s graphical enhancements make the game look better than ever, but it’s the addition of the new "Lost Mission" and the inclusion of DOOM and DOOM II that make this package a real treat for fans. The BFG version also allows for smoother play with updated controls and a more accessible experience, making it easier for newcomers to dive into the story.

While it lacks the frantic action of the older titles, DOOM 3 still stands out as an atmospheric horror shooter with a unique tone in the series. For anyone craving a mix of classic DOOM action and modern improvements, DOOM 3: BFG Edition is a solid choice.

185633106.review: Classic game that still holds up very well. Took me 7 hours to beat it but if you're a casual at these games it'll probably take you around 11.

185623440.review: Better than the reviews say but like anything not perfect.

185490749.review:
A Hellish Delight Revisited
DOOM 3 BFG Edition is the definitive way to experience the atmospheric dread and adrenaline-pumping action of id Software’s iconic shooter. 
With enhanced visuals, improved lighting, and a more streamlined experience, this edition successfully brings a 2004 classic into the modern era without losing its eerie charm!
The game excels at immersing players in its dark, claustrophobic corridors. 
Whether it's the unsettling creaks of the UAC facility or the terrifying growls of demons lurking around every corner, the sound design and atmosphere are simply top-notch. 
The addition of a shoulder-mounted flashlight is a godsend, removing the frustrating “flashlight or gun” dilemma while keeping tension high.
The package also includes the original DOOM and DOOM II, ensuring players get the full dose of nostalgia. 
It’s a joy to revisit the fast-paced action of the classics, making this edition a perfect mix of old-school thrills and revamped terror.
While DOOM 3 BFG Edition may feel slightly dated in its mechanics compared to the newer DOOM titles, its slower, more methodical pacing serves as a refreshing change of pace. It’s not just a shooter—it’s a journey into darkness.
For fans of the series or newcomers looking to explore the roots of a legendary franchise, DOOM 3 BFG Edition is an absolute must-play. 
Prepare to lock and load, hell awaits!

185193410.review:
Es el Doom 3 edición BFG. 
Si tiene algo malo es que si presionas F12 para hacer capturas de pantalla el juego lo considera como cheat, como trampa, y no te deja lograr los logros o achievements. 

A parte de eso lleva la expansion ROE y la Lost Mission, cosa que hace todo el pack que salió para Doom 3. Incluye Doom y Doom 2, es un pack bastante completo. Lástima lo de que no arreglen el bug o fallo de hacer capturas de pantalla y te lo cuente como trampa, eso está mal y no Bethesda no quiere arreglarlo.

185176597.review:
2003년당시 둠3의 첫 데모 시연때가 생각나는데 
당시 그래픽이 충격적이었고 이후에 정식으로 출시당시에 
이 그래픽이 저사양이 되는 세상이 올꺼라고 농담삼아 
얘기 하던때가 있었는데 지금이 바로 그런시대가 되었다

어두운 곳을 정말 너무 어둡게 해버리고 노골적으로
공포감에 집중했던 둠3 
그래픽은 지금 봐도 매력적이기는 하지만 
저 특유의 저해상도 텍스쳐가 여전히 거슬린다
무기 사운드나 타격감은 예전에는 별로 맘에 들진 않아서 
Pak을 받아서 쓰기도 했는데
요즘 무기 사운드가 그냥저냥인 게임이 많아서 그런지
현재는 둠3 무기 사운드가 매력있게 들린다

둠3는 고전 둠 과 둠 리부트 이터널과
다른 포지션에 있다 시원하게 뛰고 쏘기 보다는
주위를 둘러보고 기습에 조심하고 어두운 곳을 경계하고
보급품 더 얻겠다고 창고 앞에서 영어 까막눈인 상태에서 
PDA를 열어 열심히 숫자를 찾아해메고
노골적으로 공포감 조성하는 연출에 대한 스트레스를 견디며
보스전까지 가서 엔딩을 보는 게임이다

둠3가 나쁜 게임이 아니라는 거다 좋은 게임이다 
둠 시리즈를 좋아한다면 꼭 해보길 바란다

184802059.review:
Может спустя 20 лет игра не выдержала уровень качества для меня, но смотря на игры этого года, где был Prince of Persia: Warrior Within с впечатляющим повествованием про петлю времени и внушающим паркуром, тот же Far Cry с открытым миром, который был в новинку на тот момент, да даже малобюджетный Пэйнкиллер до сих пор даст жару своим геймплеем, и затем окунаешься вот в этот коридорный шутан, который может похвастаться лишь тенями, для меня выглядит всё это сомнительно. А эти постоянные подставы в виде с сзади спавнившихся врагов изюминка этой части, где все уровни - это однообразная кишка, где после срабатывания триггера враги вылазят из стен локации, и тебя какая-нибудь тварь продамажит так или иначе. Ну просто полнейший гад додумался до подобной идеи с врагами! Да и садясь за этот дум я прежде всего хотел окунуться в лор этой вселенной, а как оказалось, это просто отдельная часть ничего не рассказывающая про Палача Рока с его миром. Ладно, как говорится, ваши ожидания - ваши проблемы.
И я вот смотрю на количество кодов от сейфов, и меня дрожь пробирает от затянутости этой игры. А мне понадобится как минимум 2 раза перепройти...

The ending of the RoE is anti-climactic, but overall it's a fun game.

183777085.review: severely underrated doom game imo, and it has the 2 original doom games along with it. i strongly recommend this game

183770731.review:
Doom 3 fails badly at what it tries to achieve. Instead of the fast-paced, adrenaline-fueled gameplay the series is known for, you're stuck crawling through pitch-black hallways, fumbling with a flashlight like it's a survival horror knockoff. The combat feels sluggish, the guns sound weak, the enemy encounters are repetitive, and the scares are cheap "boo!" moments instead of genuinely unsettling. The story is uninspired, the level design is monotonous, and the atmosphere grows stale after the first hour. 

Doom 3 feels like a poorly conceived experiment that tries to reinvent the wheel but the execution is just bad. It's a slow, tedious, and lifeless entry. If you’re a fan of the series or even just good first-person shooters, skip this one. It’s a disappointing misstep in an otherwise legendary franchise.
3/10 (Bad)

183565427.review: Jogo bom, com terror envolvido, um pouco diferente dos DOOMs originais. Recomendo utilizar os .WADs do Ultimate DOOM e do DOOM II:Hell on earth em um source port externo, como o GZDOOM ou PrBoom.
